thread.title: Record-breaking heat is possible Tuesday in Sacramento
thread.title_full: Record-breaking heat is possible Tuesday in Sacramento

author:
Bill Lindelof 
blindelof@sacbee.com
title: Record-breaking heat is possible Tuesday in Sacramento
text:
Record-breaking heat is possible Tuesday in Sacramento 
Tuesday is expected to be the hottest day of the week 
Slow cooling trend is forecast beginning Wednesday Low-to-mid 90s Tuesday for the Central Valley National Weather Service i 
blindelof@sacbee.com 
The high temperature record could be broken on Tuesday in Sacramento. 
A high of 95 degrees is forecast for this afternoon. If the mercury reaches that reading, Oct. 13, 2015 would sneak into the record books, surpassing the previous all-time mark of 94 degrees set in 1994. 
The area has been gripped by an early-fall, mini-heat wave thanks to a high pressure system. The Delta breeze has been non-existent. 
Tuesday is expected to be the hottest day of the week, according to the National Weather Service. A slow cooling trend is forecast beginning Wednesday. 
By Friday, the high temperature should be in the low 80s, which is around what is should be in mid-October. 
A slight chance of rain is forecast for Saturday, but nothing is in the offing for Tuesday. The all-time record rainfall in Sacramento for Oct. 13 is a whopping 3.63 inches, an accumulation recorded in 1962. 
The detailed, 7-day forecast from the NWS for the Sacramento region: 
Tuesday: Sunny, with a high near 95. Calm wind becoming west around 5 mph in the afternoon. 
Tonight: Mostly clear, with a low around 62. West wind around 5 mph becoming light and variable in the evening. 
Wednesday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 90. Calm wind becoming southwest around 5 mph in the afternoon. 
Wednesday night: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 61. Light south wind. 
Thursday: Partly sunny, with a high near 85. South southwest wind 3 to 5 mph. 
Thursday night: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. 
Friday: Partly sunny, with a high near 83. 
Friday night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. 
Saturday: A slight chance of showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 80. 
Saturday night: A slight chance of showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 59. 
Sunday: A slight chance of showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 82. 
Sunday night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. 
Monday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 86,
